items.question: What format do my videos need to be in for subtitles?
items.answer: We support common video formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV. Ensure your videos are clear and well-structured for the best results.

items.question: Can I customize the look of the subtitles?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our tool allows you to choose from multiple styles, colors, and animations to perfectly match your video aesthetic.

items.question: Are there any restrictions on video length?

items.question: Can I edit the subtitles after generating them?
